summary: Adds smithing equipment and some chest to organise your proudsmire mansion equipment!
descriptionHtml:
Hello again, it\'s been a long time!

I\'ve been playing so much skyrim these days and i was annoyed by the fact that proudsmire mansion had no smithing equipment. Also the chests were pretty annoying because they were all over the place.

With this mod, i converted the empty storage room to a smithing room ( no smelter included ) and also added a few chest to organise your equipment and misc items.

Tell me if you seek other addons for other houses or something else, i\'m back to modding so i like to bring out new addons!

Thanks for reading :P
author: Sushikiller
